text: The Flaming Lips are an American rock band formed in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma in 1983. == Members == * Wayne Coyne – lead vocals, backing vocals, guitar, keyboards (1983–present) * Michael Ivins – bass, keyboards, backing vocals (1983–present) * Steven Drozd – guitar, keyboards, bass, drums, backing vocals, lead vocals (1991–present) * Kliph Scurlock – drums, percussion (2002–present) * Derek Brown – keyboards, percussion, guitar, backing vocals (2009–present) == Discography == * Hear It Is (1986) * Oh My Gawd!!!...The Flaming Lips (1987) * Telepathic Surgery (1989) * In a Priest Driven Ambulance (with Silver Sunshine Stares, 1990) * Hit to Death in the Future Head (1992) * Transmissions from the Satellite Heart (1993) * Clouds Taste Metallic (1995) * Zaireeka (1997) * The Soft Bulletin (1999) * Yoshimi Battles the Pink Robots (2002) * At War with the Mystics (2006) * Once Beyond Hopelessness (2008) * Embryonic (2009) * The Dark Side of the Moon (2010) * The Flaming Lips and Heady Fwends (2012) * The Terror (2013) * Lipsha (upcoming collaboration album with Kesha) == Other websites == * Official website Category:1980s American music groups Category:American rock bands Category:Musical groups from Oklahoma Category:1990s American music groups Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups
title: The Flaming Lips
